name: Keto-Friendly Low-Carb Bread
author: Rosemary Raymer
summary: My husband is diabetic. He loves this and it doesn't make his sugar levels spike! I think it's good, too. First time I made it, he called his brother and said 'I just had my first sandwich in 23 years.' Make round patties and sprinkle with poppy or sesame seeds for hamburger or hot dog buns.
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Line 2 baking sheets with rimmed edges with parchment paper
Combine egg whites and salt in a bowl
Combine egg yolks and cream cheese in a separate bowl; mix well
Add psyllium husk powder and baking soda; stir to combine
Folk yolk mixture into beaten egg whites
Pour 1/2 the dough onto 1 prepared baking sheet
Make round patties from the other 1/2 of the dough on the other prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until light brown, about 25 minutes
Cut sheet of bread into squares to use for sandwiches
